message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Would $150 be within your considerations?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original price. Would you consider $165?
Hello Alice, I've given it some thought and I'm willing to go down to $155 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
